Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I'm planning on creating a Multi-functional display like the one found in Orbiter.

Instead of diving in an spending a long time going trying things that are doomed not to work I thought I'd ask for advice here.

So first up, use usually use NGUI for gui's in unity. Im thinking of making a mock up of the gui using NGUI in a unity project then converting that ngui gui into a c# script (i.e. create empty game objects and then add ngui componets) to create to GUI. I would then include the NGUI Distribution version dll as part of the plugin.

Does this sound like a viable approach or will doing it this way mean having to fight the way KSP works, which I believe uses the Unity GUI.

Thanks
